snippet: Since Coach Gregg Popovich gave his three stars a game off, resulting in a $250,000 fine, they have led the San Antonio Spurs to 12 wins in 16 games.
abstract: San Antonio Spurs veteran Big Three stars--Tony Parker, Tim Duncan and Manu Ginobili--have led Spurs to 12 wins in 16 games since coach Gregg Popovich incurred NBA fine of $250,000 for resting all three for one game.
lead_paragraph: Since Coach Gregg Popovich gave his three stars a game off, resulting in a $250,000 fine, they have led the San Antonio Spurs to 12 wins in 16 games.

headline.main: Vindication for Popovich: Spurs Are Playing With Vigor
headline.print_headline: Vindication for Popovich: Spurs Are Playing With Vigor
